name: Cats vs Wool
description:
This game is in development, please if you wanna improve it donate to us or submit your feedback in the comments section.

Controls:

Player One (TOP): Q -> Attack, W -> Dodge

Player Two (Bottom): O->Attack, P-> Dodge

The game is supposed to be played by two players on the same place but if you don't have a friend to play with you then enable the bot.

This version of the game (for windows) is supposed to be a preview so we can gather resources, feedback and more to release it on mobile platforms such iOS and Android.
